entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h except gusting to 70 near the Strait of Georgia early this evening. Wind becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 20 April 2023
